document.full_text: a proposed law to control nongovernmental groups in cambodia threatens to silence some of the last independent voices in an increasingly repressed nation, human rights agencies said thursday.
document.title: donors asked to withhold aid over proposed law in cambodia
lines_and_colors: a proposed law to control nongovernmental groups in cambodia threatens to silence some of the last independent voices in an increasingly repressed nation, human rights agencies said thursday.
